messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] birthdays
messages.msgSnippet: **Change her birthday or have a pool party?  LOL Pam G.** The queen s birthday is celebrated in June because the weather is better for parades.  Her actual
messages.messageBody:
**Change her birthday or have a pool party? LOL
Pam G.**

The queen's birthday is celebrated in June because the weather is better
for parades. Her actual birthday falls at some less clement time in the
year.

(She'd probably like a pool party, but the paparrazzi really put a
damper on that.)

Betsy

**My son's birthday is in March, still a little cold to open the pool.
He came

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] birthdays
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/31/02 1:18:36 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... My son s birthday is in March, still a little cold to open the pool.  He came to me this year
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/31/02 1:18:36 PM Eastern Standard Time,
abtleo@... writes:

> June 25 they had a big bbq bash in the back yard, invited half the
> town, and had at it. She's 8, and still likes having a summer "birthday".
>

My son's birthday is in March, still a little cold to open the pool. He came
to me this year and said he is changing his birthday to June. He is 5 now.
So we are planning a party for June so he can have the pool party he wants.
LOL
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] birthdays
messages.msgSnippet: ... I had a friend whose oldest was born on Christmas day.  When she turned 1, they announced that the party would be an and a half affair from here on out.
messages.messageBody:
12/31/02 07:11:

> <<Good question, Mary! "What do you buy a kid that just had Christmas"!

I had a friend whose oldest was born on Christmas day. When she turned 1,
they announced that the party would be an "and a half" affair from here on
out. June 25 they had a big bbq bash in the back yard, invited half the
town, and had at it. She's 8, and still likes having a summer "birthday".
I know that some years they've done a big water park thing, etc.

It's an idea, if your child will buy the idea.

brenda

messages.subject: birthdays
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Robin, I just figured out you have the same birthday as my brother. Johanna Life is the ultimate learning experience!
messages.messageBody:
Hey Robin,
I just figured out you have the same birthday as my brother.
 
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!
